channel.title: CVE Feed for WAGO -- Series PFC200 Controller
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WAGO -- Series PFC200 Controller

item.title: CVE-2021-21001|2024-09-16T16:19:02.930Z -- wago -- series%20pfc200%20controller
item.description: On WAGO PFC200 devices in different firmware versions with special crafted packets an authorised attacker with network access to the device can access the file system with higher privileges.
